items.name: Beyond The Firs Gluten Free Pale Ale
items.desc: A grist of Extra Pale, Wheat, and Oats gave us a lean wort that was hopped in the whirlpool with Citra & Centennial. Dry hopped with Citra, Centennial, Simcoe & Idaho-7 for bright tangerine and grapefruit aromas with a subtle piney bitterness.

items.name: Cascadian Rhythm Black IPA
items.desc: We’ve started out with a malt base of pale malt, rye, dark crystal and carafa 3 to give a slightly caramelised, spicy and dark base while being restrained on roast character. A hop bill of Amarillo, Cascade, Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe & Centenntial pairs with the malt to make the beer deliciously chewy, dank, piney and floral

items.name: Enigma Fog IPA
items.desc: Super pale, chit & flaked oats make up the malt bill, providing a soft base to showcase one of our favourite southern hemisphere hops; Enigma. Hopped in the whirlpool and extensively in the fermenter for huge white grape & tropical aromatics

items.name: Magnetic Fields Ne Pale Ale
items.desc: Golden promise, chit & oats provide a soft, fluffy base for the hop schedule of Nelson, Kohatu, Idaho, Citra & Cascade to shine, delivering aromas of freshly crushed gooseberry, pineapple, citrus fruits & pine.

items.name: Multiverse IPA Series
items.desc: Mutiverse is a series of beers in which we explore what it means for a single beer to exist in multiple states. Each beer has similarities and differences, each connected but existing in it’s own unique state. Moving to Level 2 we get a boost in abv and a base with extra pale, chit & flaked oats that provides a soft base for Galaxy hops take the spotlight. The supporting role comes with the classic pairing of Mosaic & Citra for a vibrant flavours of Passion Fruit & Citrus with a piney back bone

items.name: Pintle Pale Ale
items.desc: Pintle is our core pale pale ale, brewed with wheat, oats and flaked barley in the grist for a smooth body; Whirlpooled & dry hopped with both Australian Cascade and Citra, its restrained bitterness and dry finish help maintain Pintle's all day crushability

items.name: Skog Ne IPA (Dugges Collab)
items.desc:
We are drawing from the Nordic winter for direction for this collab with our good friends at Dugges brewery.
A soft pillowy base from extra pale, oats and chit malt gives a platform for a hop combination of Idaho, Talus, Simcoe, Cashmere & Centennial to deliver big juicy aromas of pine & citrus

items.name: The Weight Of Brunch W/Mikkeller
items.desc:
In November 2019 we welcomed Mikkeller to our brewery. Into a single tank we brewed, blended and fermented together both Beer Geek Brunch & our own Weight of Gold, racked off into Bourbon barrels where the beer has rested before being treated to a cold steep of natural process coffee.
Pouring an inky black with a rich, tan head, there are complex flavours of roasted malt, coffee and sweet molasses, rounded out by the tannins & vanilla from the American oak.
